triples.name: Intelligent Agent
triples.relevance: The paper examines AI agents which are a type of intelligent agent that perceives its environment and takes autonomous actions.

triples.name: Agentic AI
triples.relevance: The core focus of the paper is on agentic systems and their potential to reshape industries through autonomous decision-making.

triples.name: Health System
triples.relevance: The paper proposes healthcare systems capable of creating adaptive treatment plans using AI agents.

triples.name: Supply Chain Management
triples.relevance: The paper proposes supply chain agents that can predict and address disruptions in real-time.

triples.name: Business Process Automation
triples.relevance: The paper discusses business process automation as an application where tasks are reallocated from humans to AI agents.

triples.name: Machine Learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning is foundational to how AI agents learn and improve their performance autonomously.

triples.name: Reinforcement Learning
triples.relevance: Reinforcement learning enables AI agents to learn through interactions with their environment to maximize rewards.

triples.name: Governance Framework
triples.relevance: The paper proposes that robust governance frameworks are essential for the ethical and scalable implementation of agentic systems.

triples.name: Autonomous System
triples.relevance: The paper examines autonomous systems that operate with minimal human intervention in complex environments.
